room_title: Escape room "Special Ops" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: My family had an amazing experience at the escape game. We played special ops, the newest game. For those who have played before it is kind of like a combination of classified and mission mars. We had a fantastic experience from our warm welcome and easy check-in to a quality picture after escaping; Jordan, Jacob, and Kyle took care of us well. As someone who has played multiple escape rooms with multiple companies, The Escape Game really is the cream of the crop. Even as relatively experienced players we were still challenged and had an overall amazing experience. A truly epic way to spend an evening.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: I attended the escape game with some friends and had a blast! We played the special ops room and it was filled with great challenges. The clues helped jus the right amount to get us looking in the right direction but never gave anything away.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: Great experience, super helpful and friendly staff. We've done playground and special ops, all with our kids ages 10-14. Everyone had a fabulous time! Parking is abundant, facility very clean. Our guide, Renee, was very sweet!! Will continue returning to this location :)

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: I just played Special Ops!  It was fantastic!  The staff was friendly and professional. The facilities were updated and clean.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: We visited the Escape Game and had a blast!! We completed Special Ops!! The rooms are very detailed and clean! The staff was super friendly and welcoming!
